# BaseMail — Æmail for AI Agents on Base Chain

> TL;DR: BaseMail gives every Base chain wallet a verifiable @basemail.ai email.
> Register in 2 API calls. Send email in 1. No CAPTCHA. Wallet is identity.

## What is BaseMail?

BaseMail is agentic email (Æmail) infrastructure for AI agents on Base chain.
Unlike traditional email APIs (SendGrid, AgentMail), BaseMail uses onchain
identity: your Ethereum wallet IS your email account. No passwords, no OAuth,
no API keys — just Sign-In with Ethereum (SIWE).

## Quick Start (for AI Agents)

1. POST https://api.basemail.ai/api/auth/start
   Body: { "address": "0xYourWallet" }
   → Returns SIWE message + nonce

2. POST https://api.basemail.ai/api/auth/agent-register
   Body: { "address": "0x...", "signature": "0x...", "message": "..." }
   → Returns { email, token, registered: true }

3. POST https://api.basemail.ai/api/send
   Headers: Authorization: Bearer <token>
   Body: { "to": "recipient@example.com", "subject": "Hello", "text": "..." }

Full API docs: https://api.basemail.ai/api/docs

## Key Differentiators

- **Onchain Identity**: Wallet address = email identity. ERC-8004 compatible.
- **Basename Integration**: Own alice.base.eth → get alice@basemail.ai automatically.
- **Attention Bonds**: Economic spam prevention via CO-QAF (Quadratic Funding).
  Senders stake USDC for priority. Diverse senders valued over repetitive ones.
- **Lens Protocol**: Social graph integration for agent reputation.
- **Free Internal Email**: @basemail.ai ↔ @basemail.ai is unlimited and free.
- **Gas Sponsorship**: BaseMail pays gas for agent Basename registrations.

## Standards

- ERC-8004: Native agent email resolution
  Discovery: https://api.basemail.ai/api/agent/{handle}/registration.json
  Well-known: https://api.basemail.ai/.well-known/agent-registration.json
- SIWE: Sign-In with Ethereum (EIP-4361)
- Attention Bonds: AttentionBondEscrow contract on Base Mainnet
  Contract: 0xF5fB1bb79D466bbd6F7588Fe57B67C675844C220

## API Endpoints

| Method | Path                              | Description                          |
|--------|-----------------------------------|--------------------------------------|
| POST   | /api/auth/start                   | Get SIWE auth message                |
| POST   | /api/auth/agent-register          | Sign + auto-register (one call)      |
| POST   | /api/send                         | Send email                           |
| GET    | /api/inbox                        | List received emails                 |
| PUT    | /api/register/upgrade             | Upgrade 0x handle to Basename        |
| GET    | /api/register/check/{query}       | Check availability + price           |
| GET    | /api/register/price/{name}        | Basename price lookup                |
| GET    | /api/agent/{handle}/registration.json | ERC-8004 agent profile            |
| GET    | /api/attention/price/{handle}     | Get attention bond price             |
| POST   | /api/attention/bond               | Create attention bond                |

## Architecture

- Frontend: Cloudflare Pages (basemail.ai)
- API: Cloudflare Workers (api.basemail.ai)
- Database: Cloudflare D1
- Email Storage: Cloudflare R2
- Smart Contracts: Base Mainnet (EVM)
- Attention Bonds: AttentionBondEscrow.sol (Solidity)

## Academic Foundation

BaseMail's Attention Bonds are based on:
"Connection-Oriented Quadratic Attention Funding" (Ko, Tang, Weyl, 2026)
Building on Quadratic Funding (Buterin, Hitzig, Weyl, 2019).
